Title: Little Women
Writer: Louisa May Alcott (by), Sarah Y. Mason (screen play), Victor Heerman (screen play)
Actors: Katharine Hepburn, Joan Bennett, Paul Lukas, Edna May Oliver
Plot: Little Women is a "coming of age" drama tracing the lives of four sisters: Meg, Jo, Beth and Amy. During the American Civil War, the girls father is away serving as a minister to the troops. The family, headed by thier beloved Marmee, must struggle to make ends meet, with the help of their kind and wealthy neighbor, Mr. Laurence, and his high spirited grandson Laurie.
